GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles in descending date order (most recent first), also showing the associated number of comments

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns information related to a specific article given in the GET request

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns all comments posted onto an article

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts new comment to an article and returns that comment
